column5: OverviewA transformative programme for students interested in gaining deeper insights into accounting and financeHone your analytical and communication skills by writing both a quantitative and qualitative dissertation in a highly supportive environmentLearn about financial and management accounting processes combined with practical training on leading databases and software systemsBe equipped with the necessary coding skills to harness the benefits of Big Data and understand how it can be used to detect fraud in corporate accountsTake relevant and contemporary modules such as coding analytics, sustainable and responsible finance, financial technology (FinTech), digital business models, and various modules specialising in specific areas of accounting, finance and bankingCourse contentThis programme is available for 12 months full-time study. The taught modules will be delivered in the first two terms while the dissertation modules (which include teaching sessions) will be delivered from June to September. The programme in its entirety runs from September to September and is University-based.
column7: For current fees please see our website.
